mapper.select: SELECT M.MESSAGEID,M.CONTENTS,M.GIVEUSERID,M.TAKEUSERID,M.SENDDATE,M.CHECKDATE FROM MESSAGE M LEFT JOIN DEL_MESSAGE DM ON (M.MESSAGEID = DM.MESSAGEID AND M.TAKEUSERID=DM.USERID) WHERE DM.MESSAGEID IS NULL AND UPPER(TAKEUSERID)=UPPER('caroin') ORDER BY M.SENDDATE DESC

SELECT M.MESSAGEID,M.CONTENTS,M.GIVEUSERID,M.TAKEUSERID,M.SENDDATE,M.CHECKDATE FROM MESSAGE M LEFT JOIN DEL_MESSAGE DM ON (M.MESSAGEID = DM.MESSAGEID AND M.GIVEUSERID=DM.USERID) WHERE DM.MESSAGEID IS NULL AND UPPER(GIVEUSERID)=UPPER('admin001') ORDER BY M.SENDDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MESSAGEID, GIVEUSERID, TAKEUSERID, CONTENTS, SENDDATE) VALUES(ADD_ID('MESSAGE', 'MESSAGEID', 'MS'), 'admin001', #{takeUserId},#{contents },SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(USERID) AS COUNT FROM LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USERID) = UPPER(#{takeUserId })
